comment.author: 67908005@N02
comment._content: When adding this interesting photo to the Clerestory Coaches (Railways) Group, in line with many other photos already there and as only the picture owner can do this, as requested in the group rules, please kindly geotag, where possible, to identify the location of this picture, for the benefit those members using Flickr's Map functionality! In the new photostream layout, click on "Add this Photo to your map" on the top of the right hand side of the white space. In case of need refer to Mapping Examples 2 & 3 click here....... As there is a setting issue with the Flickr's Mapping functionality, you will need to ensure EXIF information is set to 'Hide?=No' in your privacy settings, so that others may be able to view your map location, see : www.flickr.com/account/privacy Many thanks. {Upd 7.3/2013} (replacing comment from 3 months ago) .
